channel.title: God Vs satan
channel.description:
Who do you think would win in like a real fight, or a battle rather.
** If you don't believe in god and are going to start a debate about how God isn't real please, GTFO.

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

heatrn11:

Anyways I never said hitler loved them i said he thought it was right. If a cat takes a shit in the woods and no one is around to smell it does it still make a smell?

You can’t compare god to a piece of shit which will probably not stay there, can you? Imagine if that shit existed forever like god – if someone were to pass by it, it would still be there, while a normal shit would probably not last a long time.

Well by what you're saying it would be a no, because by what you're saying , if one cannot see something then it's obviously not there.
I'm pretty sure he never said that...
7 years ago youtube.com was released to the public right?Before youtube was released did you know it was in development? if yes, then someone had to tell you, meaning someone had to tell that person, and another person had to tell that person, makes a whole train.
I don't understand what that has to do with
What I'm trying to say is that humans are insignificant beings who have barley even scratched the surface of the universe.
tyb97:

According to records, 33% of the world believes in Christianity, this may not be accurate, but its just what I found. What I mean by it is according to the scriptures, when God feels it is time he will send his son back to world, at that time all of his followers will be sent to heaven unharmed in an event called the rapture. Leaving all the non-believers to suffer the tribulation and such. Read up on that.

Yes but what does that statistic have to do with the rapture?

Read full topic

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:62, topic:451290”][quote author=Pink Phat link=topic=554181.msg4059701#msg4059701 date=1343326283]
I think your all seeing this the wrong way.

From a Christians point of view God will obviously win.

From an atheist point of view, Satan wll obviously win.
[/quote]I sort of disagree with the second one. If you don’t believe in God how can you believe in Satan? If you believe in Satan but not God then wouldn’t you be considered a Satanist?

Even Atheist use the depiction that Satan is some red dude with horns who have large muscles who kicks ass. Who has a pointy trispear that he uses to help shove pineapples hitlers ass every three hours.

If a person who does not believe in God states they believe in Satan then they are not a real atheist. If they claim they have never seen God/jesus then how can they claim they know what Satan looks like, have they seen Satan? Or is that just their mind?

The truth is, everybody believes in something. Sometimes it’s God, sometimes it’s Satan, sometimes it’s even John Smith.[/quote]
Yes, everyone likes seeing Hitler getting pineapples up his ass.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eZQw6KuNKqs[/youtube]

But the idea of Satan as a red man with horn is stupid, it sound either catholic or like American propaganda. Satan is a serpent and that’s it. And no, you don’t need believe in anything. I have lost all faith in God, the world and humanity.

Read full topic

From an atheist point of view, Satan wll obviously win.[/quote]I sort of disagree with the second one. If you don’t believe in God how can you believe in Satan? If you believe in Satan but not God then wouldn’t you be considered a Satanist?

If a person who does not believe in God states they believe in Satan then they are not a real atheist. If they claim they have never seen God/jesus then how can they claim they know what Satan looks like, have they seen Satan? Or is that just their mind?

The truth is, everybody believes in something. Sometimes it’s God, sometimes it’s Satan, sometimes it’s even John Smith.

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Pink Phat, post:60, topic:451290”]I think your all seeing this the wrong way.

From a Christians point of view God will obviously win.

From an atheist point of view, Satan wll obviously win.[/quote]
Well obviously. This what going to turn into a religious debate no matter what, to bad the OP could not have foreseen this.

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:44, topic:451290”]So I really don’t know much about evolution and the origins of the world (egyptian) but this post is really funny.

Religion is an opinion, a belief, a faith. Not made up of scientific hypotheses. Atheists sit and read about theories that have been made, when we as Christians don’t need some equation to prove how we got here. Think about that when you look up from whatever science magazine your reading, and realize 33% of the world is gone. You will sit there and remember this. Along with everyone else.

You say that like being an opinion makes religion superior to science (PS they aren’t opposite things), yes you don’t need an equation to prove how you got here, you just need your parents telling you that a man in the sky created us from dirt.

Finally, what does “33% of the world is gone” have to do with anything?[/quote]
According to records, 33% of the world believes in Christianity, this may not be accurate, but its just what I found. What I mean by it is according to the scriptures, when God feels it is time he will send his son back to world, at that time all of his followers will be sent to heaven unharmed in an event called the rapture. Leaving all the non-believers to suffer the tribulation and such. Read up on that.

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:58, topic:451290”]heatrn11: I don’t know why I even bother at this point…

“1) Love, what is the definition of love? you’re not seeing the big picture, what you might see as love could be the complete opposite for someone else. Example, Hitler killed thousands of jews, what he did was wrong, but in his mind set he believe it to be right.”

Hitler hated Jews and several other groups. You can’t say that he was in some way loving towards them.

“The War in Iraq, Most Americans believe that the war on Iraq is a good cause, a few thousand Americans die. So what happens is the united states government declares war and kills way more then the American people who were killed in 9/11.”
OK, now I stop. I see no reason to exchange more words with you. First you come with an flawed argument, and then you are accusing Iraq for attacking you? Did you forget that Afghanistan was the terror war, and Iraq was the war on false premises.[/quote]
Wait wait, Mr.heatrn11 can fix this hold on. BACK TO THE TALK ABOUT GOD FORGET what i said about 9/11.

Anyways I never said hitler loved them i said he thought it was right. If a cat takes a shit in the woods and no one is around to smell it does it still make a smell? Well by what you’re saying it would be a no, because by what you’re saying , if one cannot see something then it’s obviously not there. 7 years ago youtube.com was released to the public right?Before youtube was released did you know it was in development? if yes, then someone had to tell you, meaning someone had to tell that person, and another person had to tell that person, makes a whole train. What I’m trying to say is that humans are insignificant beings who have barley even scratched the surface of the universe.

If you were to look at an entire community of Animals, Each animal has a certain action or job it’s suppose to perform, they all help each other to survive. Decomposition, now how could something so complex like decomposition of a dead animal or a dead plant be something that spontaneously happened over time. That’s pretty retarded if you ask me. Only an intelligent designer or creator rather, could put the universe together and make every single particle work with each other.

Can i ask you a question?

[font=arial black]How was the universe formed?[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: God Vs satan

@bowserjr2 wrote:

heatrn11: I don’t know why I even bother at this point…

“1) Love, what is the definition of love? you’re not seeing the big picture, what you might see as love could be the complete opposite for someone else. Example, Hitler killed thousands of jews, what he did was wrong, but in his mind set he believe it to be right.”

Hitler hated Jews and several other groups. You can’t say that he was in some way loving towards them.

“The War in Iraq, Most Americans believe that the war on Iraq is a good cause, a few thousand Americans die. So what happens is the united states government declares war and kills way more then the American people who were killed in 9/11.”
OK, now I stop. I see no reason to exchange more words with you. First you come with an flawed argument, and then you are accusing Iraq for attacking you? Did you forget that Afghanistan was the terror war, and Iraq was the war on false premises.

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:55, topic:451290”]heatrn11:

“Satan hates, God loves, God wants everyone to come with him to heaven, and he gives everyone a choice to pick heaven or hell.”
Then he should fix his flawed rules.

“However most human beings fear what they don’t understand.”
I don’t fear God.

"Stalin doesn’t keep you alive, "
He kicked out the Nazis from my country, not God.

“God does, he has the powers to take away your life,”
That doesn’t make him nice.

“it’s a miracle that you wake up every morning, it’s a miracle that you can talk, Eat, and walk.”
I wanted you do prove that God was nice, not a psychopath.

“To tell you the reason why God hasn’t proven himself to Earth, is that, God has actually revealed himself in the past. Why does he have to keep on repeating the same thing over and over again?”
For two-thousand years ago, Stalin showed himself several times, and we have pictures of him. I think God is shy. Not a very al-mighty behaviour.

“For a future question ‘Who created God if God created everything?’.
Simple answer God wasn’t created he always was, always is and always will be.”
God is a man made idea.

“If we were to understand everything about God then he wouldn’t be God. Would he?”
Sorry, no contradictions here.

Forget my comparison with a dictator, your description of God makes him sound like a cult leader. How can you call that behaviour loving?[/quote]

  1. Love, what is the definition of love? you’re not seeing the big picture, what you might see as love could be the complete opposite for someone else. Example, Hitler killed thousands of jews, what he did was wrong, but in his mind set he believe it to be right.
    The War in Iraq, Most Americans believe that the war on Iraq is a good cause, a few thousand Americans die. So what happens is the united states government declares war and kills way more then the American people who were killed in 9/11.

I could love a small kitten, and you could hate that small kitten. So if the kitten was sick and the kitten was dieing, you’d be happy and I’d be in a state of depression.

You can’t try and criticize God if you Know close to nothing about his exists or how he thinks.

Read full topic

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

heatrn11:

“Satan hates, God loves, God wants everyone to come with him to heaven, and he gives everyone a choice to pick heaven or hell.”
Then he should fix his flawed rules.

“However most human beings fear what they don’t understand.”
I don’t fear God.

"Stalin doesn’t keep you alive, "
He kicked out the Nazis from my country, not God. God watched the Germans exterminating 6 million Jews and killing many millions. The German army had “Gott mit uns” as slogan, so they were in fact killed in Gods name.

“God does, he has the powers to take away your life,”
That doesn’t make him nice.

“it’s a miracle that you wake up every morning, it’s a miracle that you can talk, Eat, and walk.”
I wanted you do prove that God was nice, not a psychopath.

“To tell you the reason why God hasn’t proven himself to Earth, is that, God has actually revealed himself in the past. Why does he have to keep on repeating the same thing over and over again?”
For two-thousand years ago, Stalin showed himself several times, and we have pictures of him. I think God is shy. Not a very al-mighty behaviour.

“For a future question ‘Who created God if God created everything?’.
Simple answer God wasn’t created he always was, always is and always will be.”
God is a man made idea.

“If we were to understand everything about God then he wouldn’t be God. Would he?”
Sorry, no contradictions here.

Forget my comparison with a dictator, your description of God makes him sound like a cult leader. How can you call that behaviour loving?

Read full topic

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:53, topic:451290”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=554181.msg4059611#msg4059611 date=1343319460]

I mean, he had his son crucified to save the whole human race.

I will from now on worship Stalin’s Russia, for their sacrifice in WWII.
Because in both cases, let us forget one important detail. Russia needed to make that sacrifice to beat the shit out of the invaders. The problem is that God sacrificed Jesus without reason. He made the rules, he made that strange loophole, he started he whole sacrifice idea.

Neither is good because of their sacrifices, because one of them had to, and one of them didn’t need to. You could however say that God’s action was evil, since he killed his son without reason. He could just forgive without the need of a human sacrifice, but he wanted that sacrifice.

Like I tell everyone if you don’t understand someone’s religion don’t try to criticize it, because you obviously don’t understand the difference between God the father, God the son, and God the Holy spirit.
[/quote]
What I understand is that nobody truly understands the trinity. People give lots of visualisations, but fail to give a real explanation.

So to transform your statement into an argument, where was I wrong?
Prove that God is a nicer than Stalin.[/quote]
Satan hates, God loves, God wants everyone to come with him to heaven, and he gives everyone a choice to pick heaven or hell. However most human beings fear what they don’t understand. Stalin doesn’t keep you alive, God does, he has the powers to take away your life, it’s a miracle that you wake up every morning, it’s a miracle that you can talk, Eat, and walk.

To tell you the reason why God hasn’t proven himself to Earth, is that, God has actually revealed himself in the past. Why does he have to keep on repeating the same thing over and over again?

For a future question ‘Who created God if God created everything?’.
Simple answer God wasn’t created he always was, always is and always will be.

If we were to understand everything about God then he wouldn’t be God. Would he?

Read full topic

Neither is good because of their sacrifices, because one of them had to, and one of them didn’t need to. You could however say that God’s action was evil, since he killed his son without reason. He could just forgive without the need of a human sacrifice, but he wanted that sacrifice.
[/quote]
Like I tell everyone if you don’t understand someone’s religion don’t try to criticize it, because you obviously don’t understand the difference between God the father, God the son, and God the Holy spirit.[/quote]

So to transform your statement into an argument, where was I wrong?

item.description:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:51, topic:451290”][quote author=Pink Phat link=topic=554181.msg4059615#msg4059615 date=1343320084]

I mean, he had his son crucified to save the whole human race.

I will from now on worship Stalin’s Russia, for their sacrifice in WWII.
Because in both cases, let us forget one important detail. Russia needed to make that sacrifice to beat the shit out of the invaders. The problem is that God sacrificed Jesus without reason. He made the rules, he made that strange loophole, he started he whole sacrifice idea.

Neither is good because of their sacrifices, because one of them had to, and one of them didn’t need to. You could however say that God’s action was evil, since he killed his son without reason. He could just forgive without the need of a human sacrifice, but he wanted that sacrifice.

So you think him saving the entire human race doesn’t count as a sacrifice?
[/quote]

item.title: God Vs satan

item.description:

God is more of a peaceful character, who created the world. I am not surprised at the amount of people saying Satan would win due to his personality. Although, God will do anything to protect things he loves. I mean, he had his son crucified to save the whole human race.

item.title: God Vs satan
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:45, topic:451290”]…
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hkzJ89NkIxs[/youtube][/quote]that is a horrid example… if satan is considered the “keeper of hell” then that would imply that he has some sort of ethereal power. Jesus was just the mortal shell on earth. He has no real powers. I don’t consider faith being a weapon because it was used to perform miracles not kick somebodies ass.

Read full topic
